title: Saigo no Seihonnou to Suibakusen
description:
Collection of humorous, sometimes dark, short stories.
[*] Excerpts from: The Continuation of Sexual Instinct and the Hydrogen Bomb War
[*] MUSE
[*] Preparation of a Feast
[*] Aftermath of a Feast
[*] Majo no Jouken (Conditions of a Witch)
[*] Miko's Capsule
[*] Dowman of the Dead
[*] Koi Majinai (Love Spell)
[*] The Girl from R'lyeh
[*] Zombie Na Zombie Na
